name: I Like Big Bombs!
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 29 Compo (48hrs)

The game is about dropping bombs on stuff then jumping down into the smouldering craters to collect all the loot!

You use the mouse to select bombs and drop them wherever you like. Then when you select the call Paul button it will enter 2D platformer mode.

Loot is randomly generated as well, so should be different each time! (apart from chests).

Controls:
A – left
D – right
Space – jump
E – interact with people
(works with a 360 pad as well, but you will need your mouse for the bombs)

Tools:
Construct 2 – design, code & animation
Photoshop CS4 & Wacom tablet – Art
SFX – Audacity & Bfxr
